commit.message: Update configure

iw_nl80211: don't block when receiving msgs (#123)

Info screen waits for the first data to arrive. This stalls sometimes on
my machine because the netlink command does not complete for some
reason. So, set the socket to non-blocking and try again next cycle if
no data is available. This needs a small version bump for libnl from
3.2 to 3.2.22 because only since then the call to nl_recvmsgs() returns
-NLE_AGAIN. Fixes #120.

iw_nl80211: don't block when receiving msgs (#123)

Info screen waits for the first data to arrive. This stalls sometimes on
my machine because the netlink command does not complete for some
reason. So, set the socket to non-blocking and try again next cycle if
no data is available. This needs a small version bump for libnl from
3.2 to 3.2.22 because only since then the call to nl_recvmsgs() returns
-NLE_AGAIN. Fixes #120.

commit.message: New release 0.9.5

ncurses: handle white backgrounds, too (#119)

White backgrounds broke with the support of transparency because only
the default bg color was considered. The fg color was still hardocded
to white, resulting in white on white e.g. for the config screen. So,
the default fg color needs also to be considered. Luckily, color pair 0
is set to the default colors after use_default_colors(), so we simply
need to map the index for the standard color accordingly. This will also
work when transparency is disabled because ncurses initializes color
pair 0 to white on black when not calling use_default_colors() which is
exactly what we want in this case.

Co-authored-by: Wolfram Sang <wsa@kernel.org>

committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1696888821 -0400

ncurses: handle white backgrounds, too (#119)

White backgrounds broke with the support of transparency because only
the default bg color was considered. The fg color was still hardocded
to white, resulting in white on white e.g. for the config screen. So,
the default fg color needs also to be considered. Luckily, color pair 0
is set to the default colors after use_default_colors(), so we simply
need to map the index for the standard color accordingly. This will also
work when transparency is disabled because ncurses initializes color
pair 0 to white on black when not calling use_default_colors() which is
exactly what we want in this case.

Co-authored-by: Wolfram Sang <wsa@kernel.org>

commit.message:
Info Screen: improve format of percentages 2/2

Improve on 78527b83 - automatic formatting of percentages
did not work so well.
Whitespace

iw_if.h: don't include linux/if.h (#109)

Don't include linux/if.h to avoid the following build failure:

In file included from iw_if.h:31:0,
                 from conf.c:19:
/home/buildroot/autobuild/instance-3/output-1/host/arm-buildroot-linux-gnueabi/sysroot/usr/include/linux/if.h: At top level:
/home/buildroot/autobuild/instance-3/output-1/host/arm-buildroot-linux-gnueabi/sysroot/usr/include/linux/if.h:143:8: error: redefinition of 'struct ifmap'
 struct ifmap {
        ^
In file included from iw_if.h:26:0,
                 from conf.c:19:
/home/buildroot/autobuild/instance-3/output-1/host/arm-buildroot-linux-gnueabi/sysroot/usr/include/net/if.h:111:8: note: originally defined here
 struct ifmap
        ^

Fixes:
 - http://autobuild.buildroot.org/results/a6ee162cf04b70b144b54e1ca4b7b2421071c50c

Signed-off-by: Fabrice Fontaine <fontaine.fabrice@gmail.com>

commit.message:
Build: check and set support for C99 standard (#108)

This updates the build set-up to check for and set C99 settings.
Tested with gcc-4.8 and 7.5.
build: fix compilation warning regarding clobbering value after longjmp
nl80211: update copied headerfile
Build: make -Wpedantic the default
Build: fix warnings found with -Wpedantic

Info Screen: improve format of percentages

This variant seems to work better for larger values.

Update README

Resolves #107.

Info Screen: improve format of percentages

Avoid truncation of small percentage values.

Conf Screen: move wavemonrc to $XDG_CONFIG_HOME

This honours the XDG Base Directory Specification and resolves #106.
Add portable implementation of asprintf(3).

Use PACKAGE_NAME consistently

autoconf already sets PACKAGE_NAME, so there is no need
to duplicate its definition in the code.
Fix segfault occurring when XDG_CONFIG_HOME is not set (#105).

Add support for XDG_CONFIG_HOME (#105)

Try to locate `rc` file in [`XDG_CONFIG_HOME`](https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/XDG_Base_Directory)

Fall through to the current default of `~/.wavemonrc`.
New release 0.9.4
Info Screen: fix mis-spelled format specifier (#104)

Info Screen: adjust format of inactive time

The resolution of inactive_time is milliseconds. Switch format to
msec if value is less than 0.1 seconds.

Info Screen: warn if the interface has no carrier

In addition to the `DOWN` state, this warns if the interface is up,
but has no carrier. That can happen if it is not currently bound to
an access point, for example.

Info Screen: add fields for carrier / link mode.

This adds information about the link mode and the
carrier state of the wireless interface.
Info Screen: fix display of network information

Info/History Screen: handle positive signal values

If the signal level is reported as a positive value, treat it like
an absolute value by adding the appropriate sign. Resolves #100.
Info Screen: display bonding type information (#103)
Fix memory leak and remove redundant code.
Info Screen: fix how a down wireless interface is displayed
